activities: Toptech Systems, Inc. offers hosted Software as a Service (SaaS) products that enable customers to more effectively operate their terminal business (the “Services”).  The Services gives authorized users of a customer access to business information to control or monitor certain activities.  Authorized users will have access to information such as quantities loaded, customer’s ship to locations, and the vehicles and drivers who are loading at terminals.  The Services also provide authorized users the ability to enter and centrally maintain this information to have quick access to, and control of, who is loading and when they can load.  In addition, authorized users will have access to data to develop key performance indicators to understand behaviors at terminals such as wait times, load times, and availability of product.  Some of the data provided by authorized users identifies the entity purchasing, or accepting delivery of, product, and may include driver information such as name, driver number or driver license number.  All information provided by authorized users is stored on severs in a data center in Kissimmee, Florida.
